title: The Book of Now: Quotes and messages to bring your awareness to the present moment
description: The Book of Now is a collection of quotes, messages and exercises to help bring your awareness to the present moment. Originally developed for sharing on social media, these pearls of timeless wisdom have touched the minds, hearts and souls of thousands around the world. The woman behind these words, Dr. Alexandra Domelle invites you to step into a safe, sacred place to breathe, contemplate and be present in the only moment that truly matters: Now.
author: Alexandra Domelle
